fields.label: Action Network
fields.name: action_network
fields.instructions: General settings for communicating with AN. Be sure to enter both NL & EN API endpoints in order to get the correct total of signatures.

sub_fields.label: Form shortcode
sub_fields.name: actionnetwork_shortcode
sub_fields.instructions: This is language-specific (check the AN plugin for the complete list).

sub_fields.label: Top text
sub_fields.name: top
sub_fields.instructions: Use line breaks to start a new paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Condensed
sub_fields.name: condensed
sub_fields.instructions: Always shown. Use *strong* tags for emphasis.

sub_fields.label: Extended
sub_fields.name: extended
sub_fields.instructions: Shown when active. Use line breaks to start a new paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Custom counter
sub_fields.name: custom_counter
sub_fields.instructions: Show the signature count with custom text.

fields.label: Success page
fields.name: step2
fields.instructions: Appears when the form has been submitted.
